articles.author: Chris Welch
articles.title: Sony Unveils $230 Clip-On Earbuds, Joining a Growing Wave - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Sony Group Corp. introduced its latest pair of consumer earbuds, with a clip-on design that resembles recent efforts from Bose Corp., Lenovo Group Ltd.’s Motorola unit and Huawei Technologies Co.
articles.content:

articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.title: Adobe Acrobat now lets you edit files using prompts, generate podcast summaries - TechCrunch
articles.description: Adobe is adding AI tools to Acrobat, including the ability to generate podcast summaries of files, create presentations, and a way for users to edit files using prompts.
articles.content: Adobe has been aggressivelyaddingAI features to all its products in the last few years. The company is now adding more AI tools to Acrobat, including the ability to generate podcast summaries of file… [+2036 chars]
